column2: an A.M. Eatery////Great food and hipster ambiance.  Didn't really care for the tattooed host... he was somewhat rude and not friendly.  Maybe it's b/c they are always very busy
column3: but that IS your job.... to seat folks and be pleasant.  If you can't handle the crowd and be pleasant
column4: wash the dishes in the back.  Just sayin'...
